SEARCH

Class Officer

java.lang.Object
User
Applicant
Officer
public class Officer extends Applicant
Represents an officer in the BTO Management System. An officer is also an applicant but has additional responsibilities, such as being assigned to manage a specific project.

Officers can apply for projects as applicants, but cannot apply for the same project they are assigned to manage.

      name - the name of the officer
      userID - the unique ID of the officer
      age - the age of the officer
      maritalStatus - the marital status of the officer
      password - the password for login

      public void setProjApplied(TemplateProject p)
      Overrides the applicant's setProjApplied method to prevent applying for a project that the officer is already assigned to.
      Overrides:
      setProjApplied in class Applicant
      Parameters:
      p - the project to apply for
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the project is the same as the assigned one
